responsibilities.text: Performing regular node testing of the hardware and firmware of Solbox (a digitized energy meter for PV microgrids).
Troubleshooting & updating firmware of solboxes of the microgrid customers through using AWS IoT core (OTA).
Performing regular stability testing of a 5 kW grid-connected systems along with lead acid batteries.
Preparing necessary electrical drawing and circuit analysis for product development.
Meeting with manufacturers for component selection and purchasing for Solbox

organization: Department of Electrical & Electronic Engineering,University of Scholars
courses: Power System Analysis, Power System Protections and Switchgear, Electrical Machines, MATLAB

responsibilities.text: Performing regular theory & lab sessions of undergraduate students.
Preparing course contents for Learning Management System.
Supervising capstone student projects & research activities

organization: Department of Electrical & Computer Engineering, North South University
courses: Power Systems, Power Electronics, DC Circuit, Signals Systems

responsibilities.text: Demonstrating lab experiments for undergraduate students.
Preparing lab manuals, exam scripts, and proctoring.
